solution_line_template: The cake has {cake_slices} slices * {calories_per_cake_slice} calories = <<{cake_slices}*{calories_per_cake_slice}={total_cake_calories}>>{total_cake_calories} calories.
The cake has {total_cake_calories} calories - {total_brownie_calories} = <<{total_cake_calories}-{total_brownie_calories}={calorie_difference}>>{calorie_difference} more calories.
